general.gigTitle: design or develop animated webflow website, figma to webflow site expert

sellerCard.description:
I'm Salehin, an experienced website designer with over 5 years in the field. I'm ready to design a modern, unique, and fully responsive website for you.

My services include:

➤ Webflow
➤ Wix Studio
➤ WordPress
➤ WooCommerce
➤ Elementor
➤ Figma to Webflow
➤ Landing Page Design
➤ Website Speed Optimization
➤ Website Customization
➤ Website Security.

Let’s get started on creating something amazing today!

description.content:
Hello Fiverr Community,


Are you looking for a professional Webflow Expert who can design or develop all types of websites?


"Great news! You've found the perfect gig."


I specialize in converting Figma designs into fully responsive Webflow sites.


Whether you need custom animations, interactions, or a full Webflow build, I'm here to help as your Certified Webflow Developer.


What I Offer:


  • Custom Webflow Development
  • Modern Webflow Website Design
  • Convert Figma to Webflow Design
  • Design and Develop a Webflow Website
  • Webflow Business Website
  • Webflow Portfolio and Blog Site
  • Webflow CMS Development
  • Professional Webflow Animations & Interactions
  • Responsive Webflow Design
  • Dynamic Pages with Webflow CMS
  • Advanced Webflow 3D Animations
  • 100% SEO-Friendly Structure
  • Webflow E-commerce Integration


Why Choose Me?


  • Excellent Communication Skills
  • 100% Client Satisfaction
  • 24/7 Availability
  • On-Time Delivery
  • Fast and Professional Service
  • 30 Days of Ongoing Support


Packages:


Basic: Single page (up to 6 sections) - $80

Standard: Up to 5 pages with E-Commerce - $280

Premium: Up to 10 pages with Advance Animations- $480


"Excited to Begin? Contact me today to get started on your project."

slide.name: design or develop animated webflow website, figma to webflow site expert

questionsAndAnswers.question: What Do You Need for a Successful Webflow Project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started on your Webflow project, please provide the following details: specifications, requirements, backgrounds, desired features, images, data, text, and Webflow login credentials.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be fully responsive on all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, The website will be fully responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring compatibility across all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will it be developed on Webflow or another platform?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will build your Webflow website directly in your Webflow account.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have a website yet—can you assist with creating one?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: That's no problem! We can collaborate to design and build your dream website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it possible to request a refund?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer a 100% money-back guarantee if you're not completely satisfied.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I choose you for my Webflow design needs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Because, I specialize in crafting stunning, user-friendly Webflow websites that deliver proven results.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can Webflow enhance my business?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Webflow provides powerful customization and scalability options for unique online branding.

packageList.title: Basic Webflow Website
packageList.description: 1 Page (Up to 6 Sections) ➼ Webflow Landing Page, Responsive Design, Basic Animations

packageList.title: Webflow Business Package
packageList.description: Up to 5 Pages ➼ Webflow E-commerce, Responsive Design, Custom Animations, and CMS According to Needs

packageList.title: Webflow with Animated Interactions
packageList.description: Up to 10 Pages ➼ Modern Webflow Website with CMS, Responsive Design, Complex Animations & Custom SEO

reviews.comment:
Delivered in 12 hours and just amazing person to work with. If looking for any webflow work don't get caught into trap of hiring more expensive ones as you think they will be better... he's 10X better than the other people I have paid 3X as much for webflow work on this platform because they were from UK, USA etc.

Got my business for life with anything webflow - thanks :)

seller_response.comment: Thanks a lot! You're amazing. Looking forward to working with you again and again!! Thanks!! ❤️❤️

reviews.comment: Salehin was amazing to work with! There was constant communication and updates. I love that Salehin gave himself a realistic timeline of 5 days, while communicating that it most likely wouldn't take that long. The work was finished in 2 days and is exceptional! I will 100% use them again!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure working with you. I'm excited for the next collaboration!

reviews.comment: I need refund. Truly a Time waste. Don't Hire him. A true Fraud he will make you wait for 2 days and kept saying that work is going but after 2 days he will say that something important came up.

seller_response.comment: I completed all the work and requested a little extra time for another order. This order was fully delivered as per his expectations. This rating is genuinely upsetting, and I didn’t expect this.

reviews.comment: Salehin is an OUTSTANDING website developer! His attention to detail, top-notch code expertise, and thorough documentation truly impressed me. Plus, he went above and beyond with super quick responses and timely delivery—highly recommended! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much! You’re amazing. I’d love to collaborate with you again.

reviews.comment: This is now the third time I have worked with them and they always deliver with more than I could ever imagine! They are amazing with communication, support, and delivering exactly what you are looking for!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words! I look forward to working with you again! You're Amazing!!!
